hadiths.text: Narrated Sahl:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) sent someone to a woman telling her to "Order her slave, carpenter, to prepare a wooden pulpit for him to sit on

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِسْتِعَانَةِ بِالنَّجَّارِ وَالصُّنَّاعِ فِي أَعْوَادِ الْمِنْبَرِ وَالْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Employing the carpenter and the technical hand (artsan) in making the wooden pulpit or building the mosque
